Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an affordable housing fund and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an affordable housing fund in relation to benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the eligibility for benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law and the affordability of the dwelling units.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Eligibility for benefits pursuant to section 421-a of the real property tax law and the affordability of the dwelling units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limitations on the eligibility for benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law relating to affordability of the dwelling units.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limitations on the eligibility for benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law relating to affordability of the dwelling units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to benefits pursuant to section four hundred twenty-one-a of the real property tax law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
